title: FISTTP â€” Store Integer with Truncation

fields.name: Description
fields.value: FISTTP converts the value in ST into a signed integer using truncation (chop) as rounding mode, transfers the result to the destination, and pop ST. FISTTP accepts word, short integer, and long integer destinations.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: The following table shows the results obtained when storing various classes of numbers in integer format.
